welcome_message_body: "Welcome to picturesque Sooke, known for its rugged coastline and charming small-town atmosphere. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: The floatplane terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport serves flights to and from nearby islands and coastal destinations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairchild International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairchild International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
